receive just those cards in just that order in the entire history of the universe.
But you did, and you have witnesses to testify that your records are correct. Ex-
citedly, you contact Michael Behe to announce this quite miraculous event,
surely evidence of some kind of Intelligence at work in the universe.
Your report would not be well received. Like everyone else, Behe knows
